metadata.title: USN-4332-1 -- File Roller vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that File Roller incorrectly handled symlinks. An attacker could possibly use this issue to expose sensitive information.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-4332-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  file-roller - 3.28.0-1ubuntu1.2 No subscription required
